PropertyValue.Value: select t.para_version, t.point_discount_code, case t.point_discount_type when '0' then '次数优惠' when '1' then '金额优惠' end point_discount_type, t.point_discount_start_times, t.point_discount_start_money, t.point_discount_rate, case t.dicount_reset_type when '0' then '不重置' when '1' then '按月重置' when '2' then '按季重置' when '3' then '按年重置' end dicount_reset_type from para_4034_point_discount t
